title: Week 1 NFL Schedules, Panthers QB needs, Brees future, Broncos excitement, Buffalo reaction
itunes:title: Week 1 NFL Schedules, Panthers QB needs, Brees future, Broncos excitement, Buffalo reaction
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with Week 1 of NFL Schedules. Hosts Peter Schrager, Kyle Brandt, Jane Slater, and Super Bowl Champion Michael Robinson discuss which new offense they'll be looking forward to seeing.  Jane explains why she would like to see Baker Mayfield get another chance in the NFL.  Reacting to Drew Brees' tweet this weekend, Kyle gives caution to athletes looking to jump into a broadcast booth.  Peter maps out why the Broncos could be considered Super Bowl contenders this season.  We wrap up with the crew's somber reaction to the tragedy in Buffalo.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
